lines.text: Oh, why did I give up the theatre to become a lady?
Your performance still stinks, my pet.
Those who want to fight can. I won't.
Of course I'm serious. You all know how I feel. It's nothing new. I hate war and I can have no part in it.
We all hate war, Jim. It's just there are some things we hate even more. Things we can't go on living with.
Things like, well, you heard just now.
You all despise me, don't you?
Don't talk rough. We don't despise you. We're just... just trying to understand, that's all.

Of course, I'm sorry. you've always been considerate. All of you. Mainly because you thought it was just a lot of undergraduate nonsense. Something I'd grow out of. Well, it wasn't. I haven't changed and I won't. They can do what they like about it. Put me in prison. Go to extremes. But I won't kill. And I won't help others to kill.
You're not a coward. I don't care what anybody says. I know you're not. And you... you... you are on our side, aren't you?
Of course I am. If anybody says I'm not, you sock them for me, will you?
Oh, I have. Lots of times.
You don't think the Germans could win, do you, Daddy?
Yes, I think they could. But they won't.
